name: The Christmas Maniac
description:
This Game Was Made For a Game Jam, So It isn't The Best (Also My First ever Game Jam)

You Somehow End Up with a Christmas Slasher in an Open Field, Pack Up your Bags Because Your Getting Out of There Right Now

Stupid Programmer - MEEEEEEEE/PointPogger

Modeling - MEEEEEEEE/PointPogger

Sound Effects - Partly Me/Freesound
